about_the_game:
The Season 1 Pass Includes

  • 4 Additional playable characters (each with a unique stage and Pixel Lobby avatar)
  • Exclusive character palette pack (1 for each character in the base roster and Season 1 Pass)
  • 4 Exclusive Pixel Lobby accessories

Details

  • This item requires the base game (sold separately) to be used.
  • Additional characters and colors will be available as they are released.
  • This bundle includes items that are sold separately in individual character packs.
  • The palette pack and Pixel Lobby accessories are exclusive to the Season 1 Pass and are not sold separately.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i3 550 Integrated graphics chipset or equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU (2 GHz or greater speed)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A dedicated GPU (Nvidia or AMD) with at least 750MB of VRAM strongly recommended
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game Them’s Fightin’ Herds on Steam in order to play.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
